Package net.farlands.sanctuary.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
net.farlands.sanctuary.gui.Gui
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuiEvidenceLocker, GuiTradepost, GuiVillagerEditor, VPRewardsGui
public abstract class Gui extends Object
Abstract class for GUI implementations

      action - The action to run when the item is clicked
      rightClickOnly - Whether the event should only run when the item is right clicked
